item.title: gitlog in sqlite
item.description: askgit is a great way to look at information inside of a repository. However it currently doesn't support looking at the files inside of the commit itself â€“ it gives you a view of the repository at the time of the commit, but not the patch itself. Since I don't know enough about golang and sqlite virtual tables, let's just create a sqlite3 database from the logfile. Get the gitlog We are going to use our favorite test repo, ruby-git because it's so deliciously meta.
